name: A Credit Lost In Space
description:
Hello There !

This small game is my submission for the VIDEO GAMES LAB : Game Jam 2021.

Enjoy c:

======TUTORIAL======

Move with the arrow keys and shoot with the mouse.

You have to survive and shoot aliens to gain score. Simple right ? ;)

======THEME======

For the jam, the theme was : "ARCADE"

This game is a shoot them up about the credit coin you put into the machine.

======CREDITS======

Game made by MAXENCE JACQUOT

I used 2 unity package that I own

Musics : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sfx-music-bundle-e...

Particle Effects : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/pixel-arsenal-74726
